## ScrollbarPair.set() method

Set the handles of both scrollbars.

**Signature:**

```typescript
set(x: number, y: number, updateMetrics: boolean): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The vertical content displacement, relative to the view in pixels.


</td></tr>

updateMetrics


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>
